sentence.Network_en: Lights reflected off dust-covered walls creating a ghostly luminescence.
sentence.Network_cn: 灯光照在满是灰尘的墙上，反射回苍白的冷光。

sentence.Network_en: The overhead light was covered now with a white globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在，顶灯已装上了一个白色球状罩子。

sentence.Network_en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentence.Network_cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

list.abs: 盖 cover盖骨 covering bone盖润 covered moistening
that hyoid bone covers the entrance of cricoid cartilage will bring constriction of the new laryngeal orifice and make decannulation difficult .舌骨盖在环状软骨上口易造成新喉口狭窄引起拔管困难。

auth_sentence.content: Simmer, covered, for a further two minutes.
